articles.title: Dutch regulator says it is not bypassing EMA with AstraZeneca halt - Reuters
articles.description: The Dutch medicines regulator said on Monday it was not seeking to displace the European Medicines Agency after it independently advised the Dutch government to suspend the use of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine pending a new safety review.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: Vials labelled "Astra Zeneca COVID-19 Coronavirus Vaccine" and a syringe are seen in front of a displayed AstraZeneca logo, in this illustration photo taken March 14, 20… [+1387 chars]

articles.author: Evelyn Cheng
articles.title: China's young people struggle to find jobs as unemployment rate holds at 13.1% - CNBC
articles.description: The unemployment rate for those aged 16 to 24 was 13.1% as of February, far above the national rate of 5.5%, the National Bureau of Statistics said.
articles.content:
BEIJING One year since the coronavirus pandemic hit, China's young people are still having a hard time finding jobs.
